name: Ali Gholipour
abouttext: I’m a Front-End developer with around three years of successful experience in designing and building attractive and user-friendly interfaces. During this time, I’ve worked on various projects, always aiming to create websites that are both responsive and deliver an exceptional user experience.
abouttext2: Currently, I’m continuing my learning journey and working on different projects with React and Next.js to create more engaging, optimized, and seamless user experiences. I’m looking for new opportunities to enhance my skills and provide creative solutions.
workdecriotion1: Worked on developing the admin panel and implementing the logging system.

contactMessage: Have a question, suggestion, or just want to send a warm hello? :)
Fill out the form below and I’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
Whether you have a project idea, a collaboration proposal, or simply want to write whatever’s on your mind, I’ll be happy to read it.
Your message matters — I’m looking forward to chatting with you!
